title: Comment: What the AirPods Max 2 need to be a better pair of travel headphones
content:
While many AirPods Max users would never dare to take them outside their home, Apple’s premium AirPod option sure does make for comfortable travel headphones. Between being lightweight and including active noise cancellation, the AirPods Max headphones are always with me when traveling across the country. However, the lineup could use some changes to make them better.

more…

The post Comment: What the AirPods Max 2 need to be a better pair of travel headphones appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: While Apple's AirPods Max are great for day to day use, some additions are needed for better travel comfort.
